references.reason: This paper is one of the fundamental research papers in the area of using LLMs for agents.
This reference paper introduces the concept of large language models as few-shot learners and foundational to single-agent capabilities and multi-agent interactions.

references.paper_title: Evaluating Large Language Models Trained on Code
references.reason: This is another fundamental reference on evaluating large language models.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-Thought Prompting Elicits Reasoning in Large Language Models
references.reason: Chain-of-thought prompting is used for effective planning in the multi-agent work.

references.paper_title: Generative Agents: Interactive Simulacra of Human Behavior
references.reason: This is another fundamental reference on enabling collaborative problem solving across domains.
